nodes.text: The Hull's Star system was a part of the Wild Space region of Farana. The star system, which contained no planets, was connected by the Tertiary Etti Route hyperlane to the Farana and Mytus systems, and its only significance was due to it being a jumping-off point for the Stars' End prison, which was located on a planetoid within the Mytus system.
The Hull's Star system was first described in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which was authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and which placed the system in grid square S-3.
